text: Blaze, Blast 825, Mod Pizza... All pretty much the same, but I love them all.  Great value for what you get.  I really like the this crust here at blaze.  Nice atmosphere.  Almost identical to Mod.

text: Awesome friendly staff, very happy to make sure you get what you want on your pie. Used my reward to get a free build your own. Great taste.

name: Friend
text: Tasty and made to your liking. You can choose from an array of toppings and the pie is baked while you wait. Very reasonable prices and nice atmosphere. The employees are friendly and answer any questions.  Chose one of four salads with half pizza and any toppings was filling and delicious.
